verses.text: Behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* maketh the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w empty|strong="H1238"\w*, and maketh it \w waste|strong="H1110"\w*, and \w turneth|strong="H5753"\w* it upside \w down|strong="H6440"\w*, and scattereth \w abroad|strong="H6327"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 24.1 \ft turneth…: Heb. perverteth the face thereof\f*

And it shall be, as with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, so with the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; as with the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, so with his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*; as with the \w maid|strong="H8198"\w*, so with her \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w*; as with the \w buyer|strong="H7069"\w*, so with the \w seller|strong="H4376"\w*; as with the \w lender|strong="H3867"\w*, so with the \w borrower|strong="H3867"\w*; as with the taker of \w usury|strong="H5383"\w*, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* with the giver of \w usury|strong="H5378"\w* to him.\f + \fr 24.2 \ft priest: or, prince\f*

The \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w utterly|strong="H1238"\w* \w emptied|strong="H1238"\w*, and \w utterly|strong="H0962"\w* \w spoiled|strong="H0962"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourneth|strong="H0056"\w* \add and\add* fadeth \w away|strong="H5034"\w*, the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w languisheth|strong="H0535"\w* \add and\add* fadeth \w away|strong="H5034"\w*, the \w haughty|strong="H4791"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* do \w languish|strong="H0535"\w*.\f + \fr 24.4 \ft the haughty…: Heb. the height of the people\f*

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* also is \w defiled|strong="H2610"\w* under the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof; because they have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* the \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, \w changed|strong="H2498"\w* the \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w*, \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* the \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

Therefore hath the \w curse|strong="H0423"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein are \w desolate|strong="H0816"\w*: therefore the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* are \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*, and \w few|strong="H4213"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w*.

The new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* \w mourneth|strong="H0056"\w*, the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w languisheth|strong="H0535"\w*, all the \w merryhearted|strong="H8056"\w* do \w sigh|strong="H0584"\w*.

The \w mirth|strong="H4885"\w* of \w tabrets|strong="H8596"\w* \w ceaseth|strong="H7673"\w*, the \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* of them that \w rejoice|strong="H5947"\w* \w endeth|strong="H2308"\w*, the \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* \w ceaseth|strong="H7673"\w*.

They shall not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* with a \w song|strong="H7892"\w*; strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w* shall be \w bitter|strong="H4843"\w* to them that \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* it.

The \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of \w confusion|strong="H8414"\w* is broken \w down|strong="H7665"\w*: every \w house|strong="H1004"\w* is shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w*, that no man may come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

\add There is\add* a \w crying|strong="H6682"\w* for \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*; all \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* is \w darkened|strong="H6150"\w*, the \w mirth|strong="H4885"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w gone|strong="H1540"\w*.
In the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* is \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, and the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* is \w smitten|strong="H3807"\w* with \w destruction|strong="H7591"\w*.

¶ When thus it shall be in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add there shall be\add* as the \w shaking|strong="H5363"\w* of an olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \add and\add* as the gleaning \w grapes|strong="H5955"\w* when the \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w* is \w done|strong="H3615"\w*.

They shall lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, they shall \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* for the \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, they shall cry \w aloud|strong="H6670"\w* from the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

Wherefore \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w fires|strong="H0217"\w*, \add even\add* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.  +  r 24.15  t fires: or, valleys *

¶ From the uttermost \w part|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* have we \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w songs|strong="H2158"\w*, \add even\add* \w glory|strong="H6643"\w* to the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*. But I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w leanness|strong="H7334"\w*, my \w leanness|strong="H7334"\w*, \w woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto me! the treacherous \w dealers|strong="H0898"\w* have dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*; yea, the treacherous \w dealers|strong="H0898"\w* have dealt \w very|strong="H0899"\w* \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*.\f + \fr 24.16 \ft uttermost…: Heb. wing\f*\f + \fr 24.16 \ft My leanness: Heb. Leanness to me, or, My secret to me\f*
\w Fear|strong="H6343"\w*, and the \w pit|strong="H6354"\w*, and the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*, \add are\add* upon thee, O \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* he who \w fleeth|strong="H5127"\w* from the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H6354"\w*; and he that cometh \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H6354"\w* shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* in the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*: for the \w windows|strong="H0699"\w* from on \w high|strong="H4791"\w* are \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, and the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* do \w shake|strong="H7493"\w*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w utterly|strong="H7489"\w* broken \w down|strong="H7489"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w clean|strong="H6565"\w* \w dissolved|strong="H6565"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w moved|strong="H4131"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H4131"\w*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w reel|strong="H5128"\w* to and \w fro|strong="H5128"\w* like a \w drunkard|strong="H7910"\w*, and shall be \w removed|strong="H5110"\w* like a \w cottage|strong="H4412"\w*; and the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* thereof shall be \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* upon it; and it shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and not \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the high \w ones|strong="H4791"\w* \add that are\add* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, and the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.\f + \fr 24.21 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

And they shall be gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, \add as\add* \w prisoners|strong="H0616"\w* are \w gathered|strong="H0626"\w* in the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, and shall be shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w* in the \w prison|strong="H4525"\w*, and after \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall they be \w visited|strong="H6485"\w*.\f + \fr 24.22 \ft as prisoners…: Heb. with the gathering of prisoners\f*\f + \fr 24.22 \ft pit: or, dungeon\f*\f + \fr 24.22 \ft visited: or, found wanting\f*

Then the \w moon|strong="H3842"\w* shall be \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w*, and the \w sun|strong="H2535"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and before his \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w* \w gloriously|strong="H3519"\w*.\f + \fr 24.23 \ft before…: or, there shall be glory before his ancients\f*
